> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift now knew why the tower had fired on him and his comrades.  It was
> no longer under Maximal control.  It would be a situation that Tucson could
> never handle on his own no matter how strong he is now and how determined he
> is to set things right.  But being clever was something Nightshift was
> famous for.  He radios back to Polarclaw via text message.
>
> " Guess what, I know why this tower dissed us.  It's been infested with
> those giant ugly aft bugs that we ran into at the jungle location.  Brute
> force might not work but germ warfare will.  See if you guys can drum up
> someth'n about insectile viruses, and see where we might find out how ta
> spread one and where ta find the virus spores.  Viruses can spread faster
> than we can storm a complex, and wipe out an entire colony once an outbreak
> is established."
>
> He then turns to the honey comb like structure.
>
> " I hate bugs.  And after this, the only bugs I wanna see are the ones I can
> squash under my paws!"

<NEW>

As NIGHTSHIFT sent his message a message blinked on his screen.
{Message undeliverable, cannot connect to main server. Shall I resend
when server is available?}

Yes, the radio had been down since NIGHTSHIFT had left the storage room.

However even as that was happening a side door, out of view of the
insectile drones, opened slightly, just big enough for for POLAR CLAW
to look around. It was the door leading to the stairwell.

Meanwhile in the center of the room the honeycomb structure continued
to glow, getting brighter and brighter. Cables of different sorts led
from it to different parts of the room, presumably they were feeding
power to it.

From the center of the structure the collosal form of the queen came
out, looking like a strange cross between a spider a wasp and some
sort of mantis, only with four mantis claws rather than two. She stood
at nearly 18' tall, three times as large as NIGHTSHIFT and her armored
carapase looked thick and durable.

She looked at NIGHTSHIFT, "So you two have come to crush me under your
boot?" She peered at NIGHTSHIFT and BATSCOUT. "You are small and
pathetic beings. You have no idea of the power that is my command."

Behind the queen the honey comb structure began to move and sway
slightly as it continued to glow. Meanwhile the snow and wind
continued to swirl through the room. The tempeature was getting much
colder.

(TAG)

- Preston
